duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain high quality course materials for diverse learning styles.
Identify and address individual and team-based training needs.
Conduct training sessions to enhance customer service skills, organization knowledge, and problem-solving abilities.
Monitor and suggest adjustments to training programs to meet evolving customer service requirements.
Develop and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for training programs and engagement initiatives.
Collaborate with subject matter experts and cross-functional teams to determine learning needs and develop learning objectives.
Champion a culture of development and challenge team members.
Plan, host, and organize engagement activities, events, and surveys.
Design recurring customer satisfaction surveys and analyze results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Instructional Design, HR, or a related field (Master's preferred)
